metadata.synopsis: A family of refugees plead for the Open Hand Temple to open its doors for them again. They rely on the charity of the church to survive and mourn the death of the Head Priest too. This is the tiefling girl's one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - go to -10;47; -5- Talk to the tiefling girl of the Desperate Refugee vignette in front of the Open Hand Temple

0.speaker: Nemi Kallista
0.text: Bet you won't get kicked out of the temple. They blame us for everything.

1.speaker: Nemi Kallista
1.text: Tell them that Father Lorgan was nice to us, and that we didn't do anything! We swear!
